subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN4417, how did it go?
description_text:
I cannot review since I still have not received my order. It has been over three weeks. 


Morgan



> On Dec 26, 2025, at 2:29 PM, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:
> 
> Hello Morgan,
> 
> We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds.
>

conversations.body_text: Hi Morgan Segal,    We apologize for any inconvenience caused. I see both of your packages have been delivered. Have you received them?  https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=396272738399&trkqual=12029~396272738399~FDEG  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047130778185         Happy New Year!

Yes, received the package and everything working great. Thank you for following up


Morgan



>
